content_fields.desc: The mapping of event ID to a collection of receipts for this event ID. The event ID is the ID of the event being acknowledged and *not* an ID for the receipt itself.
content_fields.title: Receipts

content_fields.desc: A collection of users who have sent ``m.read`` receipts for this event.
content_fields.title: Users

content_fields.desc: The mapping of user ID to receipt. The user ID is the entity who sent this receipt.
content_fields.title: Receipt

content_fields.desc: The timestamp the receipt was sent at.
content_fields.title: number

desc: Informs the client of new receipts.
title: Receipt Event
